arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Contact Flow.

contactFlowId.description: The identifier of the Contact Flow.

content.description: Specifies the content of the Contact Flow, provided as a JSON string, written in Amazon Connect Contact Flow Language. If defined, the `filename` argument cannot be used.

contentHash.description: Used to trigger updates. Must be set to a base64-encoded SHA256 hash of the Contact Flow source specified with `filename`.

description.description: Specifies the description of the Contact Flow.

filename.description: The path to the Contact Flow source within the local filesystem. Conflicts with `content`.

instanceId.description: Specifies the identifier of the hosting Amazon Connect Instance.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Contact Flow.

tags.description: Tags to apply to the Contact Flow. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

type.description: Specifies the type of the Contact Flow. Defaults to `CONTACT_FLOW`. Allowed Values are: `CONTACT_FLOW`, `CUSTOMER_QUEUE`, `CUSTOMER_HOLD`, `CUSTOMER_WHISPER`, `AGENT_HOLD`, `AGENT_WHISPER`, `OUTBOUND_WHISPER`, `AGENT_TRANSFER`, `QUEUE_TRANSFER`.

content.description: Specifies the content of the Contact Flow, provided as a JSON string, written in Amazon Connect Contact Flow Language. If defined, the `filename` argument cannot be used.

contentHash.description: Used to trigger updates. Must be set to a base64-encoded SHA256 hash of the Contact Flow source specified with `filename`.

description.description: Specifies the description of the Contact Flow.

filename.description: The path to the Contact Flow source within the local filesystem. Conflicts with `content`.

instanceId.description: Specifies the identifier of the hosting Amazon Connect Instance.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Contact Flow.

tags.description: Tags to apply to the Contact Flow. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering ContactFlow resources.
